price: 37. Querrán salir del fuego, pero no podrán salir de él; y tendrán un castigo permanente.
arabic: يُرِيدُونَ أَن يَخۡرُجُواْ مِنَ ٱلنَّارِ وَمَا هُم بِخَٰرِجِينَ مِنۡهَاۖ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ مُّقِيمٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: yurīdūna an yakhrujū mina al-nāri wamā hum bikhārijīna min'hā walahum ʿadhābun muqīmun
